body.p:
KENTUCKY PENITENTIARY,
H. I. TODD, KEEPER AND LESSEE.
Office Kentucky Penitentiary,
Frankfort, June 13, 1864.
Gov Bramlett
Dear Sir

Alexander Young was Sentenced from Jefferson for one year from June 23d 1863 for Stealing a watch. Please Send him a pardon as he was one of the convicts captured by the rebels on Friday night and refused to go with them

Jefferson Cir Ct
vs
Alexd Young
Pardoned
14th June/64
